Core:Properties.Core:Property:
X[M] /*
----------------------------------- LIBRARY CONTENT (Merry/SAM)
Object: Mortalis:neoct:build:@item Maintainer: Kalle Alm Email: kalle@mortalis.skotos.net Rev: 1.2 Generated: Sun Dec 2 02:16:53 2007 Last rev.: Mon Jul 10 15:44:36 2006 by zwoc (EED)
(Do not modify #list#. Automatically constructed property.)
------------------------------------------------ global:command (M) Start up the item builder. ------------------------------------------------
*/

"E[G]\\n/*\\n * D=Start up the item builder.\\n */\\nif (\$line \&\& typeof(ascii_to_mixed(\$line)) == T_INT) \{\\n Popup(\$actor, \$\{Mortalis:tools:item\}, \\"index\\", \$zid: -1, \$page: \\"item\\", \$rid: \$line);\\n\} else \{\\n Popup(\$actor, \$\{Mortalis:tools:item\}, \\"index\\", \$zid: -1);\\n\}\\necho (\\"If you are unable to use the client popup system, go to the main roster page and click 'item' in the top menu.\\");\\n "
